meanings: 거대하다 (be) huge, gigantic, enormous, immense, mammoth, massive, colossal, monstrous, titanic, stupendous
huge, great, enormous, gigantic, colossal, giant, mammoth

examples.korean: Huge palaces were built by slave labour. 발음듣기 거대한 궁궐들이 노예 노동으로 지어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Huge palaces were built by slave labour. 발음

examples.korean: The bridge is reinforced with huge steel girders. 발음듣기 그 다리는 거대한 철강보로 강화되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The bridge is reinforced with huge steel girders. 발음

examples.korean: a hulking figure crouching in the darkness 발음듣기 어둠 속에 웅크리고 있는 거대한 모습[물체] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a hulking figure crouching in the darkness 발음

examples.korean: The water churned beneath the huge ship. 발음듣기 거대한 배 아래서 물이 거세게 휘돌았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The water churned beneath the huge ship. 발음

examples.korean: Huge chimneys belched forth smoke and grime. 발음듣기 거대한 굴뚝들이 연기와 검댕을 토해 냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Huge chimneys belched forth smoke and grime. 발음
